title: Increase logo size further

requirements.text: Increase the logo size in the AppLayout header component beyond the current dimensions to make it even more prominent and visible
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in AppLayout header is noticeably larger than the previous increase
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and visual quality
Logo size is appropriate for the header layout without causing overflow or misalignment
Change is visible on both desktop and mobile viewports

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing logo design or styling beyond size
